import {Component} from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import Cookies from 'js-cookie' import './index.css' class Account extends Component { componentDidMount() { this.getUserDetails() } getUserDetails = async () => { const apiKey = Cookies.get('request_token') const url = `https://api.themoviedb.org/3/account?api_key=${apiKey}` const options = { method: 'GET', } const response = await fetch(url, options) const data = await response.json() console.log(data) } render() { return ( <>

) } } export default Account
